text:
施虐者从后抓住他的头发拉高他的脖子，直立起来的身体挤压肠道内大量液体，使Snake Eyes从鼻子里发出一声急促的喘息。 他皱紧了眉头，肌肉因为屈辱和疼痛绷紧，Storm Shadow贴着他的耳朵说：“你一定不知道性爱之前需要这种准备工作吧？ 现在，清理你自己，Brother。”
说完，Storm Shadow放开他，转身走了出去。
trans:
The abuser grabbed him from behind by the hair and pulled his neck up. His upright body squeezed a large amount of fluid from his intestines, causing Snake Eyes to let out a harsh breath through his nose. He cringed and his muscles tensed with humiliation and pain as Storm Shadow leaned into his ear and said, "I bet you didn't know you needed this kind of preparation before sex, did you? Now clean yourself up, Brother."
With that, Storm Shadow released him, turned and walked out.
